com.ui.event
Interface ComponentSelectionListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssocSelectFrame, BIRtvDetailListDialog, BIRtvFrame, BITransferDetailListDialog, BITransferFrame, CommonRtvDetailListDialog, CommonRtvFrame, CommonTransferDetailListDialog, CommonTransferFrame, CountDetailEditDialog, CountsFrame, IdtFrame, PriceAuditFrame, PriceChangeDetailEditDialog, PriceChangeFrame, SIRtvDetailListDialog, SIRtvFrame, SITransferDetailListDialog, SITransferFrame, StoreListDialog
public interface ComponentSelectionListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Listener for handling events pertaining to selecting an item from a component.

Author:
rterrell

Method Summary
 void handleDoubleClickedRow(ComponentItemDoubleClickedEvent evt)
          Implement this method to capture and process a row that has been double clicked by the user.
 void handleSelectionChanged(ComponentItemSelectedEvent evt)
          Implement this method to capture and process the row that is the recipient of a selection change in the data grid.
